snippet.title: The Legend of Baboo | Official Announcement
snippet.description:
The Legend of Baboo comes to Steam and Xbox in 2025. Wishlist now on Steam (https://bit.ly/3Ua4m9G) and Xbox (https://bit.ly/4faBmXE).

Two heroes, one legend. Play as both Sepehr and his loyal dog, Baboo, in this mystical, third-person, action-adventure. Together the duo sets off on a journey through magical lands to rescue their family from a dark and ancient evil.
